title: Sword of Chaos
content:
Sword of Chaos Very Rare 5~18 Damage 2d6 +2 Slashing+1d4 Necrotic Chaos: On a hit, regain 1~6 hit points. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The sword of Sarevok, brother of Gorion's Ward and child of the evil god Bhaal. Though much of its power died with him, the sword is still formidable, and glows with a malevolent light. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 960

2d6 +2 Slashing+1d4 Necrotic

Chaos: On a hit, regain 1~6 hit points.

Weapon Enchantment +2
